Related repos

  • Go library for retrieval-augmented generation and document search
  • AI-native database for hybrid search and retrieval with vectors, text, and structured data
  • Query unstructured documents with a natural language spreadsheet
  • PostgreSQL extension for BM25-based text search and sparse vector queries
  • Document retrieval with vision language models
  • AI framework for semantic search, workflows, and large language models
  • agentic language model for deep research and reasoning tasks
  • LLocalSearch: local search aggregator using LLM agents, runs without external API keys
